---
title: "Lab 4: Correlation & Regression"
---

## Overview

This lab introduces correlation and linear regression in R.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lab, you will be able to:

- Calculate and interpret correlation coefficients
- Create scatterplots to visualise relationships
- Build and interpret simple linear regression models
- Extend to multiple regression
- Check model assumptions
- Report results in APA format

## Parts

1. **Introduction** - Relationships between variables
2. **Correlation** - Measuring associations
3. **Simple Regression** - Predicting with one variable
4. **Multiple Regression** - Adding more predictors
5. **Diagnostics & Reporting** - Checking assumptions and APA format
